      boolean follow(java.util.UUID userIdThatFollows, java.util.UUID userIdToFollow)
      Adds the second user to the first user's following list and the first user to the second user's followers list Throws an IllegalArgumentException if any of the UUID's don't correspond to existing users

      Validates login credentials and returns the corresponding user when correct

      Saves a new user, throws an error if the user to be saved already has an UUID and therefore already exists

        Fetches all users from the datasource
        Returns:

      • findAllByUserName

        java.util.List<nl.fontys.models.User> findAllByUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        Fetches all users of which the username contains the given username string
        Parameters:
        userName - (or part of the username) to search for
        Returns:
        a list of users, or an empty list if no users are found

      • findById

        nl.fontys.models.User findById(java.util.UUID id)
        Fetches a user by it's UUID Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the UUID doesn't correspond to an existing user
        Parameters:
        id - of the user to fetch
        Returns:
        the requested user, or null if the user does not exist

      • save

        nl.fontys.models.User save(nl.fontys.models.User user)
        Saves a new user, throws an error if the user to be saved already has an UUID and therefore already exists
        Parameters:
        user - to be saved
        Returns:
        the saved user and adds it's generated UUID

      • update

        nl.fontys.models.User update(nl.fontys.models.User user)
        Updates a user, throws an error if the given user does not already exist
        Parameters:
        user - to be updated
        Returns:
        the updated user

      • delete

        boolean delete(java.util.UUID id)
        Deletes a user by it's given UUID Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the UUID doesn't correspond to an existing user
        Parameters:
        id - of the user to delete
        Returns:
        if the user has been succesfully deleted

      • login

        nl.fontys.models.User login(java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Validates login credentials and returns the corresponding user when correct
        Parameters:
        email - of the user to login
        password - of the user to login
        Returns:
        the user that's logging in or null if the credentials are invalid

      • follow

        boolean follow(java.util.UUID userIdThatFollows,
               java.util.UUID userIdToFollow)
        Adds the second user to the first user's following list and the first user to the second user's followers list Throws an IllegalArgumentException if any of the UUID's don't correspond to existing users
        Parameters:
        userIdThatFollows - the id of the user that wants to follow the second user
        userIdToFollow - the id of the user to be followed
        Returns:
        if the operation was executed succesfully

      • unFollow

        boolean unFollow(java.util.UUID userIdThatFollows,
                 java.util.UUID userIdToUnFollow)
        Removes the second user from the first user's following list and the first user form the second user's followers list
        Parameters:
        userIdThatFollows - the id of the user that wants to stop following the second user
        userIdToUnFollow - the id of the user to stop following
        Returns:
        if the operation was executed succesfully
